panels.content:
The code behind this dashboard can be found at https://github.com/nabarunchatterjee/corona

Usage: The data for a different country can be found by changing the country variable at the top of the page.

The data presented here is a representation of the data pulled from the api present at https://rapidapi.com/astsiatsko/api/coronavirus-monitor/endpoints
panels.title: Read This
Countrywise Stats (Change country at the  top of the page) [Click to expand/fold]

title: Realtime COVID 19 Dashboard (World and Countrywise Stats)
